description:
The members of the Doushisha rugby team work together to get themselves mentally prepared for the next match. Kotori buckles under the pressure of suddenly becoming a starting member against such a powerful school. And Ibuki challenges Kazutaka.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Chicken Tempura Tastes the Best Right After Being Fried.
Tori Ten wa Agetate ga Ichiban Oishii
とり天は揚げたてが一番美味しい
